sense.def:
A constraint
je nekaj, kar omejuje ali nadzoruje način, kako se vedemo.

seg.quote: The constraint on most doctors is lack of time.

sense.def:
Constraint
je nadzor nad našim obnašanjem, ki nam prepreči, da bi počeli tisto, kar želimo.

seg.quote: The list of instructions and guidelines brings with it a flavour of constraint.
